title: This War of Mine (2.2.0.6) (GOG)
description:
Install instructions:
- Run "setup_this_war_of_mine_2.1.0.5.exe"
- Run "patch_this_war_of_mine_2.2.0.6.exe"
- Play
PLEASE REMEMBER TO SEED, MANY OTHERS WANT THIS! :)
If you like this game, support the developers and BUY IT!

Change log:
Patch 1.4 (15 October 2015)
Here we are with big news - This War of Mine - New Beginning or Update 1.4 if you prefer numbers.
The New Beginning Update (also known as 1.4) introduces few extensions to the Scenario Editor. This includes new, more diverse characters to multiply possibilities in creating your stories. Weâ€™ve also integrated GOG Galaxy so expect new achievements heading your way!
Additionally, new language versions are now supported: Turkish, Korean and Japanese.
Please keep in mind the game has more than 60k words now, so there may be some untranslated words or some things may be missing and still require polishing - so please give us feedback and we'll take care of that.
Additionally, fixes and improvements include:
fixed glibc compatibility issues on Linux or simply - made to work flawlessly on Ubuntu 15
fixed a bug with small amount of trade items in Franko's inventory
fixed a bug with canceling crafting of many items after forwarding to night time
fixed a bug with fifth civilian in the shelter
price of coffee is now correlated with radio announcements
fixed a bug with clipped FOV on big locations
fixed "search body" animation
fixed a bug with wrong comments about fight in shelter
fixed exploit with dropping Saw Blade before finishing cutting through doors
fixed a wrong diary entries for some civilians
minor graphical fixes on locations
minor fixes in dialogues and texts
minor fixes in people behavior
Minor language fixes in the interface
Fix to custom portrait (no more random bug with black portraits of civilians in the scenario editor) and textures fixes
